text: Ibn Abī Uṣaybiʿa Muʾaffaq al-Dīn Abū al-ʿAbbās Aḥmad Ibn Al-Qāsim Ibn Khalīfa al-Khazrajī is known as an Arab physician from Damascus. He was born in 1203.The Great Physician Historian During the Golden Islamic Medical History – Ibn Abi Usaybi’aa == References == Category:1203 births Category:1270 deaths
title: Ibn Abi Usaybi'a
